name: Super Ness
description:
Not all monsters are bad! 

Use your head in both ways to help boats reach their destination, but be careful, they can fall over with ease!

---

CONTROLS

Mouse

---

A game made for the Quad Jam Fall 2019, with the theme "You are the monster"

Code by @galbix

Art by @alartsfg

Music by Asor020
